entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is a mysterious object that speaks to Harry. It is described as having seen Harry's heart and dreams.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is being addressed by the Horcrux. He is advised not to listen to it but to stab it instead.

entities.name: ronald weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley's dreams and fears are seen by the Horcrux. Harry advises Ron to stab the Horcrux.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is mentioned as the one whose 375 is being referred to.

relationships.description: The Horcrux speaks to Harry, warning him not to listen.
Harry is advised by another character (not specified) to stab the Horcrux.
The Horcrux has seen Ron's dreams and fears.
